comprehensive_overview: FFTW3 (Fastest Fourier Transform in the West 3) is a widely-used library for efficient computation of the Discrete Fourier Transform (DFT) and its inverse in various numerical applications. It offers highly optimized algorithms to perform fast and accurate Fourier transforms on complex and real-valued data.
core_features: Efficient computation of Discrete Fourier Transform (DFT)
Highly optimized algorithms for fast Fourier transforms
Supports complex and real-valued data processing
